channel.title: amazon aws on akifmt
channel.description: Recent content in amazon aws on akifmt

item.title: Application Sounds on Amazon AWS and Azure with Remote Desktop
item.description: Since VPS devices on AWS or Azure do not have a real sound card, it is not possible to receive sound on these devices. The solution for this is VA, that is, virtual audio. Our convenient application solution is solved with VAC installation. The application creates a virtual sound driver and directs the sound to our device. Problem: Voice over VPS Solution: Virtual Audio Cable 4.15 installation and Setup
